Docs.summary: Specifies the permission level for audio.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this enumeration to set the MediaPermissionAudio property of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission> class. The default is SafeAudio.
## Examples The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute.Audio%2A> property.
[!code-vb[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute4](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/securitypermissionssnippets/window1.xaml.vb#mediapermissionattribute4)] [!code-cs[SecurityPermissionsSnippets#MediaPermissionAttribute4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/SecurityPermissionsSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#mediapermissionattribute4)]

Docs.summary: Permission that allows unrestricted audio playback.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio NoAudio = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Permission that denies all audio playback.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio SafeAudio = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Permission that allows safe, limited audio playback, which includes denying stream access to the image file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio SiteOfOriginAudio = int32(1)
